name: Urbana
description:
Learn the rules of the road and earn high scores by ticketing traffic rule breakers in this charming, minimalistic metro simulation!

Urbana is a 2D, bite-sized, traffic management sim that allows players to step into the role of an all-seeing enforcer of traffic rules. It's a race against time to catch as many violators of the rules as they can to earn points and achieve all 3 stars for each level! Every few levels, a new rule is introduced and a new violation made ticket-able so that players can learn more and catch more to meet the challenge of increasing level requirements.

Urbana was a CAPSTN1 entry (1st term, SY 2019-2020) designed with the goal of educating players on basic traffic rules in the Philippines. As the solo developer, I am proud and happy to share this prototype! I do hope to work on it further in the future so if you have any suggestions or comments, please let me know. Thanks!
